ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy.  Glad you found the gay EQ email list.  There are a few gay guilds on different servers.  We have a rather large and growing gay guild on the Rodcet
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy. Glad you found the gay EQ email list. There are a few gay guilds on
different servers. We have a rather large and growing gay guild on the
Rodcet Nife server. If you would like to join us just make a character on RN
and give a tell to someone in the guild to ask an officer to get you an
invite. I'll be doing a little PLing this weekend so if you decide to join
us you may get a little boost to start off with =) We also have a mailing
list on yahoo groups and a website at www.mysticalliance.com

Andy Cottrell
Taren Despottrell
46th Barbarian Shaman
Mystic Alliance (Rodcet Nife) Guild Leader

timowear@... wrote:

> Hi, I just did a search for gay groups within EQ, wondering if there
> is one, and well.. I found this one :)
>
> it's good to know that you're all out there, and I hope to meet some
> of you in the future..
>
> oh.. btw I play mostly on Mith Marr
> so if you see me on say "Hi!"
>
> Datain - Level 12 Dwarven Warrior
> Deepfear - Level 5 Barbarin Shaman
> Quip - Level 8 Half-Elf Bard
>
> (those are my 3 main characters)
>
> so, just wanted to say Hi!
>
> -Quip Tobasco
>
>
